title: Bautista's bat flip right at home this postseason
text: Bautista's bat flip right at home this postseason Friday, 16 October 2015 (4 minutes ago) CHICAGO (AP) Anthony Rizzo was waiting for his turn for batting practice when he mimicked a big swing, and then flung his bat into the top of the cage and glared out at the field. José Bautista Celebrates Playoff Homer With Awesome Bat Flip 00:46 With two runners on and the fifth and deciding game of the American League Division Series tied in the bottom of the seventh inning, Jose Bautista crushed a Sam Dyson pitch into the upper deck of the Rogers Center to give the Jays a 6-3 lead. In a postseason that's already had its fair share of... Recent related news Bautista adds big bat flip to postseason full of flying lumber, joining Cespedes, Schwarber ABCNews.com 2 hours ago - Sports Also reported by • Huffington Post You Might Like Other recent news in Sports
